input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, I recently acquired a MacBook Air M1 from your online shop. Unfortunately, the keyboard appears to be acting up, and several keys are unresponsive. Could you kindly guide me on how to obtain a replacement or request a refund? My account number is <acc_num> You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. I eagerly await your swift reply My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. Thank you, <name> <tel_num>
